attributes.action: Investigate the practices used by Atos Medical to arrange medical appointments on behalf of the DWP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Silent calls from this company are a regular practice. If you dont return their call an letter is sent asking you to call to arrange an appointment. Followed up next day with an appointment. 
DWP pass your details including ex directory phone numbers to this third party even if you specifically ask for details not to be passed on.
They appear to be unaware of what medical condition you have and are uninterested in daetails. 
Can the Government ensure that medicals are only booked when appropriate.
Cancer sufferers undergoing treatment are expected to attend a medical, not good enough that they are already being treated by specialists.
